title: Ethereal The Coven
description: Being placed in a foster home four months before graduation was not part of the plan. But maybe, in some weird way, it was a blessing. A chance to start over in a normal town, with normal friends, and a normal family.But Danville is anything but normal. The families here have powers that have been passed down from generation to generation.And Marley, not only does she have powers, but hers are different. Stronger. She doesn't need the coven to control her abilities anymore. But the coven needs her. And something dark wants her. Marley might not know much about her new powers yet, but there's one thing she's certain of... The people in her coven, they can't be trusted.
author: Chrissy Brown
